message.name: ERR_TASKREDIRECTION_XRV_ALLOCATION_BLOCKING_USER
message.locale: User "%1s" is currently blocking Task Allocation. Please choose another user for redirection.

message.name: ERR_TASKREDIRECTION_PENDING_CYCLIC_REDIRECTIONS_ARE_INVALID
message.locale: User "%1s" has an pending Task Redirection specifying user "%2s" as the destination. Please choose another user for redirection.
